sentences.sContent: But I would like to suggest enough of them to impress upon you the richness and complexity of my background.
sentences.sContent_eng: But I would like to suggest enough of them to impress upon you the richness and complexity of my background.
sentences.sCn: 但我仍会给出足够多的建议让你对我的背景留下丰富而富有综合性的印象。

trans.tranOther: if something has richness, it contains a lot of interesting things
